Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is potted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and very slight traces of black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394770) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394770)
